creator: anish.sneh@techblue.co.uk
text:
As we find in some of the cmsui files (cmsui.xml, cmsui_*.xml - Lenya v2.0.2), xmlns="http://apache.org/cocoon/i18n/2.1" namespace is missing which causes an untranslated error on the interface (an i18n issue). 

Adding this namespace to all of the cmsui.xml/cmsui_*.xml solves the problem.


Add this as a patch will be really helpful.

creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
text: Seems that this is fixed in current trunk. Right ?
